clusters.name: <Friendly name of the Qumulo Cluster>
clusters.sqlite_db_path: <Full local path of the SQLITE db. It will be created when the app runs the first time>
clusters.csv_data_path: <Full local path of the location to save the CSVs of Qumulo API data>
clusters.api_username: <API user name for Qumulo storage cluster>

email_account.server: <smtp server and port, if necessary. if you're using google/gmail, it's smtp.gmail.com:465>
